title: Fed Up. CAN'T CONNECT AFTER CHAMPION SELECT!
body:
Alright, I have nothing but respect for you amazing men and women at Riot, but my patience regarding this very atrocious bug is wearing thin. MANY people are having this issue, some for MONTHS! There was even a STICKY above now its gone.

You know the symptoms, AFTER CHARACTER SELECT, GAME TRIES TO CONNECT TO YOUR SERVERS THEN RADS ERROR STATINg CAN'T CONNECT ,CHECK FIREWALL SETTINGS. I apologize for the caps, but I had to, because for me, its been going on for more than two weeks. I've invested literally hundreds into this game, had a pretty good track record, and yet I can't play because of an issue on your end?

Like MANY other people on these boards, we've tried the whole troubleshoot dance, multiple times. Tried the YouTube advice, tried the  VPN's, tried the new router, heck I would switch ISP but its the only one in my territory, but none of us should go through all this trouble just to play ONE DARN MATCH WITH FRIENDS.

Please, check your servers, I'm sure you have a lot things to do in your office and manage your pipelines, but c'mon, I'm asking as one fan of this wonderful IP, to another fan, because you wouldn't be working there if you weren't fans, right? Please, PLEASE PLEASE fix this bug, we just want to play the game you built.

Sincerely, 

Cresent8

Hey Crezent! Thanks for bringing your issue to the Help and Support board! ^_^

There was an issue a bit ago where players were getting a RADS error when trying to connect to the game. I know you said you tried some of the troubleshooting steps in the Wrenchmen's Toolbox and the knowledge base, but have you tried switching to a public DNS and flushing your DNS cache? Eambo [wrote an excellent guide](http://forums.euw.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=2053745) on how to do this, I really suggest you check it out and give it a shot.

This did nothing...

I completely agree with Elduris here.  The first step is to make sure that you have tried switching to a Public DNS and Flushing your DNS.  This should have the greatest chance of resolving this issue.

However, if your still consistently experiencing this error message, you should definitely check out our [Connections Issue Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).  It has a collection of common solutions that usually resolve this error.  

If your still experiencing these errors, no matter what steps you take, then don't give up just yet!  Make sure to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!  One of our Tech Specialists can respond to you and work with you one-on-one until we get a solution to this error.  If you do submit a ticket, make sure to include the following information:

1) Network Analysis: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq1

2) NetworkInfo Log: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq4

3) Process List: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3
